com.soa.policy.wspolicy
Interface SubPolicyAssertion

All Superinterfaces:
Assertion
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractSubPolicyAssertion, JavaAssertion, XmlAssertion
public interface SubPolicyAssertion
extends Assertion

A type of assertion that supports sub-policy, meaning that the assertion might or must have nested policy. The cloneAssertion method is an additional interface requirement, used during normalization. The implementation of this clone method need not clone any WS-Policy specific aspects of the assertion, such as assertion name, assertion optional, assertion ignorable, and assertion sub-policy - these are handled by the framework.

Method Summary
 Assertion cloneAssertion()
          Returns a cloned version of this assertion.
 boolean contains(javax.xml.namespace.QName assertionName)
          Returns whether an assertion with the given QName is present in the sub-policy.
 Policy getSubPolicy()

Methods inherited from interface com.soa.policy.wspolicy.Assertion
getName, isIgnorable, isOptional, setIsIgnorable, setIsOptional, setName
 

Method Detail

getSubPolicy

Policy getSubPolicy()
Returns this assertions sub-policy. If this assertion had no sub-policy, it may return null. If this assertion will never have sub-policy, it should not be a SubPolicyAssertion.

setSubPolicy

void setSubPolicy(Policy subPolicy)
Sets this assertion's sub-policy.

contains

boolean contains(javax.xml.namespace.QName assertionName)
Returns whether an assertion with the given QName is present in the sub-policy.

Parameters:
assertionName - QName of the assertion being searched for.
Returns:
true if found, false if not.

cloneAssertion

Assertion cloneAssertion()
                         throws GException
Returns a cloned version of this assertion.

Throws:
GException
